attributes.action: Reconsider The Legal Smoking Age Or Allow A Clause
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reconsider A Clause For Those Who Turned 16 Before The Legal Age Of Smoking Was Changed To 18 Because It Is Unfair To Take Away The Right Of People Who WERE Able To Smoke As They May Have Already Become Addicted

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
